task.summary: Finished icons overwrite function. Finished the ErrorsCollector. Make some words cap.
Added the way to convert a texture pack without icon.
Added the way to convert a texture pack without icon+Fixing bugs
Fix a problem that app FC while converting some packs.
Added a function what shows users the status of the pack.
Added a function that can help users compress their packs.
Uses Netease Bugrpt to collect and upload error logs.

MESSAGE.value: Finished icons overwrite function. Finished the ErrorsCollector. Make some words cap.
Added the way to convert a texture pack without icon.
Added the way to convert a texture pack without icon+Fixing bugs
Added a tutorial activity.And made the java directory clear!
Fix a problem that app FC while converting some packs.
Add a function that can delete a pack by swipe a card.
Added a function what shows users the status of the pack.
Added a function that can help users compress their packs.
Uses Netease Bugrpt to collect and upload error logs.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Uses Netease Bugrpt to collect and upload error logs.
